```{r}

library(ggmap)
library(gmapsdistance)
library(knitr)
```

#Getting a map of Asia
```{r}
Asia_map <- get_map("Asia", source="google", api_key = apiKey, zoom=12)

ggmap(Asia_map)
```
```{r}
USA_map <- get_map("United States", source="google", api_key = apiKey, zoom=12)
```

```{r}
ggmap(USA_map)
```
